main event: On 23 March 1963, a light of 24 magnitude was observed in Babylon, New York.
interesting points: The object changed its brilliance and fluctuated colors between white,It moved to SSW and SW, disappearing into the sky,At times, it moved through haze and appeared as faint as 4th magnitude and briefly as 3rd magnitude.,The object was observed for 6 minutes in daytime., There appear to be multiple reports of sightings in various locations around the same period.
witness description: Not explicitly provided, but involves an observation of a light.
